short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables having different audio settings per channel.
short.tr: Her kanal için farklı ses ayarı kullanmayı sağlar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you set different audio options for each channel. It has two options:

- Set volume
- Use FrankerFaceZ Audio Compressor (if FFZ is installed)

VOD and Clip pages are not supported.
